description: Essential concepts of pharmacology and pharmacodynamics are reviewed for the major drug classes. The biochemical and physiological effects of drugs are related to their therapeutic and toxicologic effects.
name: BASIC CONCEPTS OF PHARMACOLOGY & THERAPEUTICS

values.comments: Students found that time was misallocated among topics. Despite these complaints, students found Professor Boullata to be a “wonderful” professor who was able to explain difficult material in an understandable fashion. Students went as far to say that Professor Boullata was their favorite professor at Penn.
